column4: Unit Size：W288xD300xH77mm；Actual Power：2200W；Supply Voltage：220-240V~50/60Hz；Control：Touch keys，4 keys，8 red LEDs，1 x three-digit segment display；Glass size：287×287mm，black color，artwork can be customized；Timer：Yes；Length of Power Cord：1.2mtr；Packaging accessories：User manual，PE bag，inner tray，gift box，carton；Net weight：2.2KG；Container information：1 pcs/gift box，8 pcs/carton
